name: Disco Knight Jousting
description:
Lets remember the distant past of 4083, where disputes were not handled through conversation. Rather everyone was granted a knighthood by the disco queen, and used that title to slam eachother out of the dance floor. 

So grab a friend, hum a song, 

cause this is how you'll get along!

Now don't hold back and do what's right.

For you are a Disco Knight. 


1.3 Out NOW! Play the  solo boogie mode to have some fun!!

A and D to turn. Hold  W to charge up and release to fling yourself forward.

J and L to turn. Hold  I to charge up and release to fling yourself forward.
